name: part_005
file: tmp_【 ごちそうさまでした 】沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブ【ホロライブ⧸沙花叉クロヱ】 [F9lbxgimNIE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Sakamata Chloe, Kanade Izuru, and Rikka perform 'Bitter Choco Decoration'.
Instrumental transition to the next song.
Sakamata Chloe performs her original song 'Gitai Gokko'.
MC section: Sakamata Chloe greets the audience and talks about the setlist and guests.
A video letter from Hololive CEO YAGOO (Motoaki Tanigo) begins.

subtitles.original:
いい子はもちろん　ままごと一生
後回しにやってこうぜ
subtitles.english:
Good kids, of course, play house for a lifetime.
Let's put it off and get going.

subtitles.original:
ああ、思い出した　あんたの時の
生真面目そうな...
subtitles.english:
Ah, I remember... you looked so serious
back then...

subtitles.original: やっぱいいや
subtitles.english: Never mind.

subtitles.original:
笑ってるけど　どこか泣いてんだ
痛みはご褒美の日な
subtitles.english:
Laughing but crying somewhere.
Pain is the reward day.

subtitles.original:
思ってるけど　ずっと溜めてんだ
いつの味　呪いのアイが
subtitles.english:
Thinking it, but always bottling it up.
What flavor is it? This cursed love...

subtitles.original: 擦り減って濁って　アイラブ自分
subtitles.english: ...worn down and muddied. I love myself.

subtitles.original: さてそうやって　こもって不干渉
subtitles.english: Now, hiding away like that, non-interference.

subtitles.original: 大きな声　少ししてみるけど
subtitles.english: I try to make a loud noise.

subtitles.original: 乾いた傘　痛いってなるんだ
subtitles.english: But a dry umbrella just ends up hurting.

subtitles.original: わがままに選んではポイして
subtitles.english: Selfishly picking and tossing away.

subtitles.original: 理屈抜きで夢とか信じたい
subtitles.english: I want to believe in dreams without any logic.

subtitles.original:
劣等でどうかしちゃ
マリオネットなんかじゃない
subtitles.english:
If I'm inferior, so what?
I'm not some marionette.

subtitles.original: 擬態ごっこいいよもっと
subtitles.english: Mimicry is fine, give me more.

subtitles.original: つまんない朝よりのシンデレラ
subtitles.english: Cinderella from a boring morning.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい　消えたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, I want to disappear, it's warping.

subtitles.original: 僕と僕との境界線
subtitles.english: The boundary line between me and myself.

subtitles.original: どれも正解で
subtitles.english: They're all correct.

subtitles.original: どれも正解だった
subtitles.english: They were all correct.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい　消えたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, I want to disappear, it's warping.

subtitles.original: 僕と僕との境界線
subtitles.english: The boundary line between me and myself.

subtitles.original: 君だけに教えてもいいか
subtitles.english: Can I tell only you?

subtitles.original:
Brain in the world of myself
to myself isolated cycle
subtitles.english:
Brain in the world of myself
to myself isolated cycle

subtitles.original:
I'm go where I don't go
or maybe I chose not to know
subtitles.english:
I'm go where I don't go
or maybe I chose not to know

subtitles.original: 光って出ちゃって　I hate 自分
subtitles.english: Shining and coming out, I hate myself.

subtitles.original: 避難って壊した　ポンコツの才能
subtitles.english: Called it refuge and broke it, a piece of junk talent.

subtitles.original: また隠しちゃって　後悔して
subtitles.english: Hiding it again and regretting it.

subtitles.original: 変わったつもりが　嫌ってなるんだ
subtitles.english: Thought I changed, but I end up hating it.

subtitles.original: うざいうざい愛　不信感次第
subtitles.english: Annoying, annoying love, depends on the distrust.

subtitles.original: 糸切ってそろそろ　息したい
subtitles.english: Cut the strings, I want to breathe soon.

subtitles.original:
劣等でどうかしちゃ
マリオネットなんかじゃない
subtitles.english:
If I'm inferior, so what?
I'm not some marionette.

subtitles.original: 嫌いなんだったか　言ってたんだ
subtitles.english: I was saying I hated it.

subtitles.original: 足掻いてみたって　本音は死んでいた
subtitles.english: No matter how much I struggled, my true feelings were dead.

subtitles.original: 選びたい　捨てたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want to choose, I want to throw away, it's warping.

subtitles.original: 僕と僕との境界線
subtitles.english: The boundary line between me and myself.

subtitles.original: どれも正解で
subtitles.english: They're all correct.

subtitles.original: どれも正解だった
subtitles.english: They were all correct.

subtitles.original: 選びたい　捨てたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want to choose, I want to throw away, it's warping.

subtitles.original: マリオネットだから
subtitles.english: Because I'm a marionette.

subtitles.original: 擬態ごっこいいよもっと
subtitles.english: Mimicry is fine, give me more.

subtitles.original: つまんない朝よりのシンデレラ
subtitles.english: Cinderella from a boring morning.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい　消えたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, I want to disappear, it's warping.

subtitles.original: 僕と僕との境界線
subtitles.english: The boundary line between me and myself.

subtitles.original: どれも正解で
subtitles.english: They're all correct.

subtitles.original: どれも正解だった
subtitles.english: They were all correct.

subtitles.original: 叶えたい　消えたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want it to come true, I want to disappear, it's warping.

subtitles.original: 僕と僕との境界線
subtitles.english: The boundary line between me and myself.

subtitles.original: どれも正解で
subtitles.english: They're all correct.

subtitles.original: どれも正解だった
subtitles.english: They were all correct.

subtitles.original: 選びたい　捨てたい　歪んでいくんだ
subtitles.english: I want to choose, I want to throw away, it's warping.

subtitles.original: 僕と僕との境界線
subtitles.english: The boundary line between me and myself.

subtitles.original: 君だけに教えてもいいか
subtitles.english: Can I tell only you?

subtitles.original: で、それすらもう　どうでもいいか
subtitles.english: And even that doesn't matter anymore.

subtitles.original: はい！ということで！
subtitles.english: Yes! And so!

subtitles.original:
バクバクバクーン！秘密結社holoXの掃除屋、
インターンシャチの沙花叉クロヱです！いただきまーす！
subtitles.english:
Baku-baku-bakoon! Cleaner of Secret Society holoX,
intern orca Sakamata Chloe here! Itadakimasu!

subtitles.original:
はい、えー今日は沙花叉の卒業ライブに来てくださり、
本当にありがとうございます！
subtitles.english:
Yes, uh, thank you all so much for coming
to Sakamata's graduation live today!

subtitles.original:
えー、ハッシュタグ、こちらの沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブで
ぜひ感想をつぶやいてもらえると嬉しいです！
subtitles.english:
Uh, the hashtag is #沙花叉クロヱ卒業ライブ,
I'd be happy if you could tweet your thoughts there!

subtitles.original:
そしてもうすでにトレンド1位ということで、
ありがとうございます！みんなありがとう！
subtitles.english:
And apparently it's already trending at number 1,
so thank you! Thank you everyone!

subtitles.original:
はい、ということで、えー「オーバーブライトパレード」、
「あのバンド」、「ビターチョコデコレーション」、「擬態ごっこ」と歌わせていただきました。
subtitles.english:
Yes, and so, I sang "Overbright Parade", "Ano Bando",
"Bitter Choco Decoration", and "Gitai Gokko".

subtitles.original:
「あのバンド」ではすいせい先輩とぺこら先輩に
ゲストに来ていただいて...
subtitles.english:
For "Ano Bando", Suisei-senpai and Pekora-senpai
came as guests...

subtitles.original:
「ビターチョコデコレーション」では「かな研」のお二人に
来ていただきました！ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english:
For "Bitter Choco Decoration", the two from "Kanade Kan"
came! Thank you very much!

subtitles.original:
ちょっとどちらもね、違ったテイストではあると思うんですが、
すごくかっこいい曲だったんじゃないでしょうか。
subtitles.english:
They both have different tastes, but I think
they were really cool songs, weren't they?

subtitles.original:
どうでした？いい感じだった？
ね、いい感じだったよね！
subtitles.english:
How were they? Good?
Yeah, they were good, right!

subtitles.original:
よかったらね、そちらのたくさん愛も
つぶやいてください。よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english:
If you'd like, please tweet lots of love for them too.
Thank you!

subtitles.original:
そして、えー沙花叉のソロ曲ですね、「オーバーブライトパレード」と
「擬態ごっこ」、どちらも生で歌わせていただいております。
subtitles.english:
And, uh, Sakamata's solo songs, "Overbright Parade" and
"Gitai Gokko", I'm singing both of them live.

subtitles.original:
緊張しすぎて声が出ません！
もう助けてください！
subtitles.english:
I'm so nervous my voice won't come out!
Someone help me!

subtitles.original:
なんかもう無理かもしんない、本当に！
見守って...
subtitles.english:
I feel like I might not be able to do this, seriously!
Please watch over...

subtitles.original:
ちょっと応援よろしくお願いします。お願いお願いお願い。
マジで超緊張してるんで。よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english:
Please give me some support. Please, please, please.
I'm really super nervous. Thank you!

subtitles.original:
お、え、YAGOOからなんかビデオレターが来てるって？
はい、じゃあ見ます！よろしくお願いします！
subtitles.english:
Oh, uh, a video letter from YAGOO?
Okay, let's watch it! Go ahead!

subtitles.original: クロヱさん、また配信をご覧のみなさん、こんばんは。
subtitles.english:
Chloe-san, and everyone watching the stream,
good evening.
